name: Vortex The Pretty MGGJ Edition
description:
A magical princess girl 3d platformer, where you can twirl off of ramps, on walls, and even the ceiling, join Vortex The Pretty with her friends Malena and Polly who find a gopher hole, fall down into it and are lead into a seemly magical world, meet the mysterious mother of that world and play her games!

(Only the mac version has been tested, however in the past the windows compiles of my games run slowly, so a word of warning for that)

This version was built for the Magical Girl Game Jam 3 as a late submission.
